question_text: What is the primary goal of Business Intelligence (BI)?
Which of the following is NOT a component of BI?
Which data visualization technique is used to show hierarchical data structures?
What is OLAP in the context of Business Intelligence?
Which type of analysis is used to discover hidden patterns in large datasets?
What does ETL stand for in the context of data warehousing?
Which data mining technique is used to segment customers based on their behavior?
What is the purpose of a BI dashboard?
option_a: A) To display key performance indicators (KPIs)
correct_answer: A) To display key performance indicators (KPIs)

question_text: Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of a data warehouse?
What role does SQL play in Business Intelligence?
option_a: A) It is used for data retrieval and manipulation
option_b: B) It is used for data analysis
option_c: C) It is used for data integration
option_d: D) It is used for data visualization
correct_answer: A) It is used for data retrieval and manipulation
